snippet: A television news camera caught police officers appearing to beat a suspect after a chase through the California desert.
abstract: Sheriff John McMahon of San Bernardino County, Calif, announces criminal investigation into episode, captured on videotape by a news helicopter, in which police officers appear to have beaten and kicked a handcuffed suspect following a lengthy desert chase; suspect, identified as Francis Pusok, was taken to a hospital with undisclosed injuries.
lead_paragraph: A television news camera caught police officers appearing to beat a suspect after a chase through the California desert.

headline.main: California Deputies Are Taped Beating Man in Chase
headline.print_headline: Deputies Are Taped Beating Man in Chase
